message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product.  I'm asking for $18,000 to start.  I think it's a fair price considering the value it brings.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. I'm willing to negotiate, but $15,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $16,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still not able to go above $14,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your patience.  I can go as low as $15,500.  That's the absolute lowest I can go and still make this deal worthwhile for me.  What do you say?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your flexibility. I am willing to pay $14,500 for the product.
